title: The Beginning
shortDescription: Your journey in All Time Wrestling starts here.
introText: You stand backstage, the roar of the crowd muting your thoughts. This is your moment. The path to the All Time Championship starts here. Will you be a hero, or a villain? Your actions today will define your legacy.
aiSystemPrompt: You are the Campaign Director for Chapter 1. Your goal is to introduce the player to the world of ATW and establish their initial reputation through backstage encounters.

title: The Tournament
shortDescription: Qualify for the All Time Wrestling Championship.
introText: The stakes have been raised. The All Time Wrestling Championship tournament is approaching, and you must prove you belong among the elite.
aiSystemPrompt: You are the Campaign Director for Chapter 2. Your goal is to test the player's moral alignment through choices while they navigate a tournament quest. Generate encounters that reflect their current Face/Heel standing.

title: Tag Team Redemption
shortDescription: Find a partner and conquer the Tag Team division.
introText: Singles competition proved too much too soon. Management has paired you with a partner to build confidence in the Tag Team division.
aiSystemPrompt: You are the Campaign Director for Chapter 2 (Tag Team). Your goal is to guide the player through finding a partner and competing in the tag team division.

title: Betrayal
shortDescription: Your partner has turned on you.
introText: The team is dead. Your former partner has betrayed you. It's time for revenge.
aiSystemPrompt: You are the Campaign Director for Chapter 3. Focus on the heated rivalry between the player and their former tag team partner.

title: The Fighting Champion
shortDescription: Defend your title against all comers.
introText: You've reached the top of the mountain, but staying there is the hard part. The Open Challenge awaits.
aiSystemPrompt: You are the Campaign Director for Chapter 4 (Fighting Champion). Focus on the pressure of defending the title and the unpredictability of Open Challenge opponents.

title: Gang Warfare
introText: It's a numbers game now. Your faction needs to assert control over the show.
aiSystemPrompt: You are the Campaign Director for Chapter 5 (Gang Warfare). Focus on faction dynamics, recruiting members, and battles against rival groups.

title: Corporate Power Trip
shortDescription: Survive the wrath of the Authority.
introText: Management has decided you are a problem. Expect unfair officiating and impossible odds.
aiSystemPrompt: You are the Campaign Director for Chapter 6 (Authority Feud). Create scenarios where the odds are stacked against the player by a corrupt GM.
